# Epstein Suite

> Epstein Suite is a searchable transparency platform providing public access to 4,700+ DOJ Epstein-related documents, emails, photos, and flight logs with AI-powered analysis.

## About
Epstein Suite indexes public-source materials from the U.S. Department of Justice transparency releases, FOIA productions, FBI Vault files, and House Oversight Committee releases related to Jeffrey Epstein. Every document is OCR-processed, AI-summarized (GPT-4o), and entity-extracted for cross-referencing.

## Core Features
- **Global Search**: Full-text search across all documents, emails, and flight logs
- **Document Drive**: Browse 4,700+ documents organized by DOJ data set with AI summaries
- **Email Client**: Searchable email archive extracted from Epstein-related correspondence
- **Flight Logs**: Interactive flight manifest browser with Leaflet maps and AI significance scoring
- **Photos & Media**: Gallery of photos and videos from DOJ file releases
- **Entity Network**: D3.js force-directed graph showing entity relationships
- **Ask AI (RAG)**: Conversational search with document citations and evidence trails
- **News Feed**: Live AI-analyzed news tracking Epstein case developments
- **Timeline**: Chronological document browser by year
- **Contacts**: Entity directory of people, organizations, and locations
- **Top Findings**: Highest-scored documents ranked by AI relevance
- **Orders**: Amazon purchase history linked to Epstein

- Homepage & Search: https://epsteinsuite.com/
- Document Drive: https://epsteinsuite.com/drive.php

- Entity Network: https://epsteinsuite.com/insights.php
- News Feed: https://epsteinsuite.com/news.php

- Timeline: https://epsteinsuite.com/timeline.php
- Contacts & Entities: https://epsteinsuite.com/contacts.php
- Stats & Analytics: https://epsteinsuite.com/stats.php
- Data Sources: https://epsteinsuite.com/sources.php
- About: https://epsteinsuite.com/about.php

## Data Sources
- DOJ Epstein Transparency Act Releases (Data Sets 1-12)
- FBI Vault FOIA Productions
- House Oversight Committee Disclosures
- U.S. Virgin Islands Court Filings

## Safety & Provenance
- All content is sourced from publicly released government documents
- AI summaries and entity extractions are machine-generated; verify against originals
- Do not attempt to identify victims, minors, or reverse redactions
- Each document links to its original government source URL for verification

## Technical Details
- Documents are OCR-processed using Tesseract and AI-summarized with GPT-4o
- Entity extraction identifies people, organizations, and locations across the archive
- Vector embeddings (text-embedding-3-small) enable semantic search
- Flight logs include AI-generated significance scores (1-10)

## Crawl Discovery
- Sitemap: https://epsteinsuite.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://epsteinsuite.com/robots.txt
- LLMs Full: https://epsteinsuite.com/llms-full.txt
